titles.title: National Amusement Park Ride Safety Act of 2011
To restore the jurisdiction of the Consumer Product Safety Commission over amusement park rides which are at a fixed site, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Manufacturing, and Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 9/7/2011--Introduced. National Amusement Park Ride Safety Act of 2011 - Amends the Consumer Product Safety Act to include amusement rides permanently fixed to a site as a consumer product for purposes of regulation by the Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC).
